doc.title: Couples Seduce Teens Vol. 3
doc.plot: How does a couple revive a fizzling sex life? One sure fire way is to pick up a smokin' hot teen and give her the night of her young life. It is amazing what fucking your wife while she licks some pussy will do for your libido, not to mention that feeling you get when a new pair of lips wrap around your cock for the first time. Hey, I guess it's true; marriage is what you make of it.
